Azure Skincare Hemp & Collagen Nourishing Eye Serum

Brand: Azure

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Collagen, Propylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Hemp Seed Oil, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Glycerin, Betaine, Hexapeptide-3, Beta-Glucan, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Xanthan, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edt
book: 2745-Azure Skincare Hemp & Collagen Nourishing Eye Serum

chunk:
ycerin, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol

Directions: After cleansing, pat serum into upper/lower eye areas and allow to absorb before applying other treatments.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
